item.title: Reply to https://barryfrost.com/2023/09/i-m-getting-the-dreaded-rattling
item.description: I thought it was just me. I took in my brothers airpods pro and after diagnostics the right and left ones needed replacement. They quoted replacements for ~$160 but somehow the system allowed it to be marked as $90. Except it wouldnt let me...
item.content:encoded:
I thought it was just me. I took in my brothers airpods pro and after diagnostics the right and left ones needed replacement. They quoted replacements for ~$160 but somehow the system allowed it to be marked as $90. Except it wouldnt let me check out...

He ended up getting a new set of the latest pros for cheaper.

This all feels like a scam so you are forced to purchase apple care.

item.description: Liked https://lifeofpablo.com/blog/i-left-nebraska-two-years-ago-for-california
Finding weird bugs in my micropub server after months of no updates is fun. I've been meaning to make some changes to it so maybe now is the time.
